author: newsr.in
title: Live Blog: Apple's 'Hey, Siri' iPhone 6s, iOS 9, Apple TV (and iPad Pro?) launch
text: Apple knows how to put on a show, and today is no different. Even those with little more than a passing interest in the company are (come on, admit it!) eager to see exactly what will be unveiled. For the most part we know what to expect. There's the iPhone 6s, iOS 9 and Apple TV which are all but guaranted to mae an apperance, and there have been suggestions about the long-rumored iPad Pro. Whatever the event holds, there is sure to be at least one surprise, and there's not long to wait to find out more There's a… [Continue Reading] »
